mapper.update:
update exam_class_project
class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_type = #{applyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
declare_type = #{declareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_opinion = #{auditOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_person = #{auditPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_name = #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_level = #{companyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_type = #{companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_years = #{workYears,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certificate_num = #{certificateNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certificate_time = #{certificateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
expiry_date = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
continue_edu = #{continueEdu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_class_project set class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_type = #{applyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, declare_type = #{declareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_opinion = #{auditOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_person = #{auditPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_name = #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_level = #{companyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_type = #{companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_years = #{workYears,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate_num = #{certificateNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate_time = #{certificateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, expiry_date = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, continue_edu = #{continueEdu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.*,t5.certificate_num,t5.certificate_time,t5.expiry_date from ( select t1.id,t1.city,t1.company_level,t1.company_type,t1.work_years,t1.continue_edu,t3.project_name,t4.class_num,t4.class_name,t2.pnum,t2.name,t1.sex,t2.birth_date,t2.work_name,t2.school,t2.major,t2.degree,t2.tel,t1.apply_type,t1.declare_type,t1.`title`, t1.`learning_content`, t1.`cumulative_hours`, t1.`appointment_time`, t1.`register_type`,t1.remark from exam_class_project t1,user_info t2,exam_project_info t3,exam_class_info t4 where t1.status != '0' and t1.user_id=t2.id and t1.project_id=t3.id and t1.class_id=t4.class_id ) t left join exam_certificate_info t5 on t.pnum=t5.card_id and t.class_num=t5.class_num where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from exam_class_project where audit_status='审核通过' and status='1' and class_id is null and project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
